metadata.title: CVE-2017-17505 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In HDF5 1.10.1, there is a NULL pointer dereference in the functionH5O_pline_decode in the H5Opline.c file in libhdf5.a. For example, h5dumpwould crash when someone opens a crafted hdf5 file.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
